header.title: Defeating Anti-Semitism at Home, Abroad, and on Campus
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: Anti-Semitism impacts the lives of our Jewish friends and neighbors here at home and across the globe. It continues to fester on college campuses in the form of calls for Boycotts, Divestments, and Sanctions (BDS) against Israel and numerous instances of ostracization of Jewish students. Within the United Nations, resolutions incessantly malign Israel with outrageously false allegations while other acts seek to deny the historical ties of the Jewish people with the land of Israel. Here in the U.S., some elected officials use anti-Semitic tropes with seeming impunity. This panel will explain the dynamics of contemporary anti-Semitism and how we can work together to defeat it.

commentThread.commentText: American school will teach you that history has long hated the jew but never bothers explaining why.
